alert.note: Alert for Orange; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 11:01AM EDT until May 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in New York NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey...New York... Ramapo River near Mahwah affecting Orange, Passaic, Rockland and Bergen Counties. For the Ramapo River...including Mahwah...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ramapo River at Mahwah. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding along Route 202. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.1 feet on 12/12/2008. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Ramapo River Mahwah 8.0 8.0 Mon 10 am ED 7.3 6.3 5.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM EDT.
